games.hex.board

Interface Board

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGameBoard, SimpleGameBoard

    public interface Board
    Interface for the Hex Board.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addObserver(java.util.Observer observer)
      This method exists in the Observable class.
      java.util.Set<Tile> getNeighbors(Tile tile)
      Returns a Set of the Tile neighboring the specific Tile.
      int getSize()
      Returns the number of Tiles along a side of the board.
      Tile getTileAt(int x, int y)
      Returns the Tile located at the board location specified by the x and y coordinates.
      void makeMove(Move move, PlayerColor playerColor)
      Sets the boards[x][y] Tile to the PlayerColor specified.

    • Method Detail

      • getSize

        int getSize()
        Returns the number of Tiles along a side of the board. All boards should be square.
        Returns:
        int - the size of the board.

      • getTileAt

        Tile getTileAt(int x,
             int y)
        Returns the Tile located at the board location specified by the x and y coordinates.
        Parameters:
        x -
        y -
        Returns:
        Tile

      • getNeighbors

        java.util.Set<Tile> getNeighbors(Tile tile)
        Returns a Set of the Tile neighboring the specific Tile. The set should have a size of no fewer than 4 and no more than 6.
        Parameters:
        tile -
        Returns:
        Set

      • makeMove

        void makeMove(Move move,
            PlayerColor playerColor)
        Sets the boards[x][y] Tile to the PlayerColor specified.
        Parameters:
        move -
        playerColor -

      • addObserver

        void addObserver(java.util.Observer observer)
        This method exists in the Observable class. By making any implementor of this interface also extend Observable, we can pass around and add observers to anything that implements Board.
